settings.title: Antioxidants
settings.description: Antioxidants are all-stars. By neutralising free radicals, they defend the skin’s barrier from pollution, improve the skin’s natural repair response and support sunscreen to keep you protected.

settings.title: Phytomolecules
settings.description: Active plant compounds are a natural team player for our skin. Phytomolecules work with our skin cells to support everything from the stimulation of collagen to the production of antibacterial properties.

settings.title: Vitamins
settings.description: For our bodies, these powerful micronutrients support optimal function, and they do the same for our skin. Vitamins are the heavy lifters in any regenerative skincare routine, they help in supporting the healthy function of our skin barrier and cellular response.

settings.title: Botanicals
settings.description: Extracted from flowers, herbs, nuts, seeds, roots and berries, botanicals infuse skincare with the powerful antimicrobial, antioxidant-rich and hydrating benefits of nature to replenish skin health.

settings.title: Amino Acids
settings.description: Amino acids are essential to the function of the body and that’s true of the skin as well. They offer powerful support by promoting cellular repair, amplifying hydration, reducing inflammation and providing antioxidant protection.

settings.title: Oleosomes
settings.description: Oleosomes are rich in Essential Fatty Acids to draw hydration deep into the skin. We believe that using the right ingredients is the most important factor in restoring the Natural Moisturising Factor (NMF) and Oleosomes are key to keeping skin hydrated.

settings.title: Dermal Delivery Accelerators
settings.description: The best ingredients in the world do little if they sit on the surface of the skin. Our products are specially formulated to be delivered deep in the skin where the work is done.

settings.title: Clinical & Efficacious
settings.message: We choose clinically backed ingredients and use them at efficacious levels to get the most for your skin. Our Global Antioxidant Serum contains a clinically efficacious dose of Elixir IRTM, a flavonoid rich knotgrass extract that protects the dermis fibres from infrared damage.

settings.title: Real Change Enhancers
settings.message: Some skincare brands use ingredients that are designed to create an immediate, but temporary benefit to the skin. The problem with this approach is it teaches your skin to be lazy without the benefit of a health improving function. We use ingredients that support your journey to skin health. This long-term approach improves the overall look of skin and improves barrier function over time, and we know you value that hard work takes time.

settings.title: Sustainable & Responsible
settings.message: We created a winning team of ingredients from Canada and around the world that are responsibly sourced and sustainable, like PhytoSpherixTM (recognized as an unrivaled energy source by our skin cells) which is made in Guelph, Ontario. This ingredient uses a water-based, mechanical extraction method with no harsh solvents or chemicals. Our formulations are manufactured with pride in Canada and our packaging is 100% recycled, recyclable or offset with the Repurpose Plastic Neutral Program.

settings.title: Dermal Delivery Accelerators
settings.message: Even the best ingredients in the world do little if they sit on the surface of the skin, without penetrating where they are most effective. Our products are specially formulated with a wide array of ingredients clinically proven to improve active ingredient bioavailability. They act as a carrier to help enhance the performance of the active ingredients in our skincare products.

settings.heading: Ingredient Selection Playbook
settings.message: All Lontreau products include powerful ingredients that are clinically proven to support regenerative signals and healthy barrier function.
